law.catch_line: In this section, "clean-burning fuel" has the meaning stated in § 9-101 of the Tax - General Articl...

text.section: In this section, "clean-burning fuel" has the meaning stated in § 9-101 of the Tax - General Article.
Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, refueling equipment or machinery used only to dispense clean-burning fuels into motor vehicles is not subject to property tax.
